title.narrative: Capital Market Development Program Cluster (Subprogram I) (formerly Financial Governance and Social Security Reform Program II)

description.narrative: The proposed Program is the second loan in the cluster program comprising two loans to support policy reforms for financial governance and social security. The Program will build upon completed reforms for strengthening the financial sector under FGSSR I, and will support the Government in carrying forward its reform agenda for the financial sector as set forth under the Government's Economic Policy Package Pre and Post IMF (White Paper) issued in 2003.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Increased contribution by the capital market to domestic financing

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
A doubling of the number of individual holders of market securities, equity and government bonds, including through mutual funds between 2006 and 2009.

description.narrative: Increased contribution by the capital market to domestic financing

title.narrative: Increase in market capitalization by 30% from 2006 to 2009
